body.para: I found out how to fix this problem in case anyone else has it.
Also, if you're gmail for mobile doesn't work and you're in the UK...this might just help.
Yesterday I changed my language settings in Gmail to UK English. Then gmail for mobile stopped working.

Today I just changed it back to US English on the off chance that might be where the conflict was...and what do you know...my Gmail for Mobile is happily working fine...giving google more opportunity to sell ad space in front of my eyeballs.
So...little Gmail for Mobilers...try changing the language setting on Gmail to US English and see if that then helps the next time you use Gmail for Mobile.
